about_the_game:
Carve your way through the streets of Hermes with the original soundtrack to the grueling action-RGP Thymesia. Feel the intensity across the 15 tracks.

The Thymesia Original Soundtrack was composed and arranged by Ben Ridge, CJ Kao, Yen-Ming Huang, Sound Jaeger Studio, Red Eyes Studios
detailed_description:
Carve your way through the streets of Hermes with the original soundtrack to the grueling action-RGP Thymesia. Feel the intensity across the 15 tracks.

The Thymesia Original Soundtrack was composed and arranged by Ben Ridge, CJ Kao, Yen-Ming Huang, Sound Jaeger Studio, Red Eyes Studios
legal_notice: Thymesia © 2022 OverBorder Studio, Published under licence by Team17 Digital Limited.
name: Thymesia Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 95 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 421 MB available space
